statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND blood_type = 'O';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE name = 'John Doe';

DELETE FROM MedicalRecords
WHERE record_id = 1001 AND patient_id = 2001;

DELETE FROM MedicalRecords
WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE health_condition = 'Critical');
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND prescription = 'Antibiotics';
DELETE FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id IN (SELECT provider_id FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology');
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 5678 AND date_visited < '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE provider_id IN (456, 789);
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 1 AND date_of_visit < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_id IN (SELECT prescription_id FROM Prescriptions WHERE medication = 'Aspirin');
